Executor¶

ShellTask support several options to enable the bash script run within specific environments.

Conda¶

  • conda="bwa samtools"

  • conda="env.yaml"

  • conda="path/to/environment"

Singularity¶

  • image="docker://bioconda"

Example¶

@shell(conda='bwa', image='docker://ubuntu')
def bwa_map(fa, fastq):
    ...
